definitions: the process of performing a scientific procedure, especially in a laboratory, to determine something

examples.text: experimentation on the brain and the nerves
after experimentation in the laboratory, the first vines of the new clone were planted

shortDefinitions: process of performing scientific procedure to determine something

definitions: the action or process of trying out new ideas, methods, or activities

examples.text: It was a period of innovation and experimentation with new decorative techniques
experimentation with drugs has been associated with boredom

shortDefinitions: action or process of trying out new ideas, methods, or activities
